23 static const std::string kFolderPrefix = "test_results/";
24 
25 template <typename VoxelType>
26 class LayerMergeToolTest : public ::testing::Test,
27  public voxblox::test::LayerTest<VoxelType> {
28  protected:
29  virtual void SetUp() {}
30 
31  void initializeSimulatedWorlds() {
32  world_A_.reset(new Layer<VoxelType>(voxel_size_, voxels_per_side_));
33  world_B_.reset(new Layer<VoxelType>(voxel_size_, voxels_per_side_));
34  world_B_compare_.reset(new Layer<VoxelType>(voxel_size_, voxels_per_side_));
35 
36  SimulationWorld simulation;
37  Point lower_bound, upper_bound;
38  lower_bound << -0.5, -0.5, -0.5;
39  upper_bound = -lower_bound;
40  simulation.setBounds(lower_bound, upper_bound);
41 
42  // Transformation generated at random by minkindr
43  // Translation 0.15m, Rotation: 28.6479 degrees
44  // clang-format off
45  Eigen::Matrix<FloatingPoint, 4, 4> T_B_A;
46  T_B_A << 0.959292, 0.233991, 0.158138, -0.0627464,
47  -0.277701, 0.883428, 0.377407, 0.126472,
48  -0.051394, -0.405959, 0.912445, -0.0506717,
49  0. , 0. , 0. , 1.;
50  // clang-format on
51  T_B_A_ = Transformation(T_B_A);
52 
53  // Define sphere 1.
54  Point c1_A;
55  c1_A << 0.1, 0., 0.;
56  constexpr FloatingPoint sphere_1_radius_m = 0.05;
57 
58  // Define sphere 2.
59  Point c2_A;
60  c2_A << -0.2, 0, 0.2;
61  constexpr FloatingPoint sphere_2_radius_m = 0.03;
62 
63  // Define sphere 3.
64  Point c3_A;
65  c3_A << 0., 0.1, -0.2;
66  constexpr FloatingPoint sphere_3_radius_m = 0.075;
67 
68  // Prepare world A
69  simulation.addObject(std::unique_ptr<Object>(
70  new Sphere(c1_A, sphere_1_radius_m, Color(255u, 0u, 0u))));
71  simulation.addObject(std::unique_ptr<Object>(
72  new Sphere(c2_A, sphere_2_radius_m, Color(255u, 0u, 0u))));
73  simulation.addObject(std::unique_ptr<Object>(
74  new Sphere(c3_A, sphere_3_radius_m, Color(255u, 0u, 0u))));
75  simulation.generateSdfFromWorld(max_distance_world, world_A_.get());
76  simulation.clear();
77 
78  // Prepare world B
79  simulation.addObject(std::unique_ptr<Object>(new Sphere(
80  T_B_A_.transform(c1_A), sphere_1_radius_m, Color(0u, 255u, 0u))));
81  simulation.addObject(std::unique_ptr<Object>(new Sphere(
82  T_B_A_.transform(c2_A), sphere_2_radius_m, Color(0u, 255u, 0u))));
83  simulation.addObject(std::unique_ptr<Object>(new Sphere(
84  T_B_A_.transform(c3_A), sphere_3_radius_m, Color(0u, 255u, 0u))));
85  simulation.generateSdfFromWorld(max_distance_world, world_B_.get());
86  simulation.generateSdfFromWorld(max_distance_world, world_B_compare_.get());
87  }
88 
89  Transformation T_B_A_;
90  typename Layer<VoxelType>::Ptr world_A_;
91  typename Layer<VoxelType>::Ptr world_B_;
92  typename Layer<VoxelType>::Ptr world_B_compare_;
93 
94  const double voxel_size_ = 0.005;
95  const size_t voxels_per_side_ = 16u;
96  const double max_distance_world = 2.0;
97  const double max_sdf_value_to_visualize = 0.015;
98 };
99 
100 typedef LayerMergeToolTest<TsdfVoxel> TsdfLayerMergeToolTest;
101 
102 // TODO(mfehr): Not yet supported by the layer merging function.
103 // typedef LayerMergeToolTest<EsdfVoxel> EsdfLayerMergeToolTest;
104 
105 TEST_F(TsdfLayerMergeToolTest, MergeTwoTsdfLayers) {
106  initializeSimulatedWorlds();
107 
108  const std::string kWorldAPlyFile = kFolderPrefix + "world_A.tsdf.ply";
109  LOG(INFO) << "Writing world A to : " << kWorldAPlyFile;
110  io::outputLayerAsPly(*world_A_, kWorldAPlyFile,
111  io::PlyOutputTypes::kSdfIsosurfaceConnected);
112  const std::string kWorldASdfPlyFile = kFolderPrefix + "world_A.tsdf_sdf.ply";
113  io::outputLayerAsPly(*world_A_, kWorldASdfPlyFile,
114  io::PlyOutputTypes::kSdfColoredDistanceField,
115  max_sdf_value_to_visualize, max_sdf_value_to_visualize);
116 
117  const std::string kWorldBPlyFile = kFolderPrefix + "world_B.tsdf.ply";
118  LOG(INFO) << "Writing world B to : " << kWorldBPlyFile;
119  io::outputLayerAsPly(*world_B_, kWorldBPlyFile,
120  io::PlyOutputTypes::kSdfIsosurfaceConnected);
121  const std::string kWorldBSdfPlyFile = kFolderPrefix + "world_B.tsdf_sdf.ply";
122  io::outputLayerAsPly(*world_B_, kWorldBSdfPlyFile,
123  io::PlyOutputTypes::kSdfColoredDistanceField,
124  max_sdf_value_to_visualize, max_sdf_value_to_visualize);
125 
126  LOG(INFO) << "Merging world A into world B...";
127  constexpr bool kUseNaiveMethod = false;
128  mergeLayerAintoLayerB(*world_A_, T_B_A_, world_B_.get(), kUseNaiveMethod);
129 
130  LOG(INFO) << "Evaluating merged world...";
131  utils::VoxelEvaluationDetails result;
132  utils::evaluateLayersRmse(*world_B_compare_, *world_B_,
133  utils::VoxelEvaluationMode::kEvaluateAllVoxels,
134  &result);
135  constexpr FloatingPoint kFloatingPointToleranceLow = 5e-5;
136  EXPECT_NEAR(result.rmse, 6e-5, kFloatingPointToleranceLow);
137 
138  constexpr FloatingPoint kFloatingPointToleranceHigh = 1e-4;
139  EXPECT_NEAR(result.min_error, 0.0, kFloatingPointToleranceHigh);
140  EXPECT_NEAR(result.max_error, 0.002, kFloatingPointToleranceHigh);
141 
142  constexpr size_t kUintTolerance = 10u;
143  // The overlap between B and A+B is obviously exactly as big as B itself.
144  EXPECT_NEAR(result.num_evaluated_voxels, 8000000, kUintTolerance);
145  EXPECT_NEAR(result.num_overlapping_voxels, 8000000, kUintTolerance);
146  EXPECT_NEAR(result.num_ignored_voxels, 0, kUintTolerance);
147  // This results from the simulated world of A being transformed into b, i.e.
148  // this is A_transformed - B.
149  EXPECT_NEAR(result.num_non_overlapping_voxels, 4278466, kUintTolerance);
150 
151  const std::string kMergedLayerPlyFile =
152  kFolderPrefix + "world_A_and_B.tsdf.ply";
153  LOG(INFO) << "Writing merged world to : " << kMergedLayerPlyFile;
154  io::outputLayerAsPly(*world_B_, kMergedLayerPlyFile,
155  io::PlyOutputTypes::kSdfIsosurfaceConnected);
156  const std::string kMergedLayerSdfPlyFile =
157  kFolderPrefix + "world_A_and_B.tsdf_sdf.ply";
158  io::outputLayerAsPly(*world_B_, kMergedLayerSdfPlyFile,
159  io::PlyOutputTypes::kSdfColoredDistanceField,
160  max_sdf_value_to_visualize, max_sdf_value_to_visualize);
161  LOG(INFO) << "Done.";
162 }
163 
164 int main(int argc, char** argv) {
165  ::testing::InitGoogleTest(&argc, argv);
166 
167  FLAGS_logtostderr = true;
168  FLAGS_alsologtostderr = true;
169  FLAGS_v = 1;
170 
171  google::InitGoogleLogging(argv[0]);
172 
173  int result = RUN_ALL_TESTS();
174 
175  return result;
176 }
